name: DEPRECATED: Avoid use of standard SQL API
description:
The rule reports all pages that reference a class, interface or method whose full qualified name begin with 'java.sql.' or 'javax.sql'

Standard SQL APIs java.sql.* and javax.sql.* are symptoms of direct access to tables.
output:
This report lists all JSP pages using standard SQL APIs 
It provides the following information: 
 - Page name
 - the number of violation
rationale: Standard SQL APIs java.sql.* and javax.sql.* are symptoms of direct access to tables.
remediation: Review the architecture design to invoke the layer in charge of database access.
sample:
<%@ page import = "java.sql.*" %>
<% Connection myConnection =null; //VIOLATION
      Statement myStatement =null; //VIOLATION
      ResultSet myResultSet =null; //VIOLATION
      javax.sql.DataSource myDataSource = null; //VIOLATION
%>

// 4 violations will be reported
alternativeName: Ensure that the architecture design of the application invoke the layer in charge of database access.
